items.sentence: Tom has been working as Mary\'s chauffeur for years.
Tom just wanted to make sure that\'s what you meant.
Tom knew Mary wouldn\'t want to go there by herself.
Tom said goodbye and then got into his car and left.
Tom said that he had no intention of leaving Boston.
Tom says he has no intention of returning to Boston.
Tom and Mary have an extraordinarily happy marriage.
Tom doesn\'t have to do this if he doesn\'t want to.
Do you think they\'ll figure out we\'re from Boston?
The story is true. Only the names have been changed.
